analysis.description:
GameTestToken.canSubAllocation (/unique_chucks/20/0xdfcaa43e60580f53aff0c61422e4a55fa25ab61b.sol#514-538) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- allocations[sender][j].time >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/20/0xdfcaa43e60580f53aff0c61422e4a55fa25ab61b.sol#529-534)

GameTestToken.subAllocation (/unique_chucks/20/0xdfcaa43e60580f53aff0c61422e4a55fa25ab61b.sol#538-550) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- allocations[sender][j].time < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/20/0xdfcaa43e60580f53aff0c61422e4a55fa25ab61b.sol#544-549)
